trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the defender hits with it.

trait.name: Shelter
entries: Allies within 5 feet of the Bastion gain a +2 bonus to their AC, if the Bastion is not {@condition prone} or {@condition incapacitated}

trait.name: Shield Charge
entries: If defender moves at least 10 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a {@item flail|phb} attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The defender makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage in melee, or 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage at range.

reaction.name: Block
entries: The Bastion adds +3 AC against an attack that would normally hit it. To do so, the bastion must see the attack and be wielding a shield
